slideInfo.slideDescription: Cal Poly alum and 20 year industry veteran

about.name: Emily Tracy
about.overview: I am an experienced software developer specializing in UI and frontend design and development. My interest in visual-based programming started at Cal Poly when I took classes in virtual reality and animation. These influenced me to do my senior project using Java 3D to highlight the visual effects on object positioning from specific types of matrix math computations. For a good portion of my career, I've been writing software applications for the live production/broadcast markets. I began with Windows-based application development using C#, Windows Forms, and then eventually, WPF and XAML. In more recent years, my focus has shifted to developing web-based applications using Angular and Typescript. If you are in need of some Angular web development experience, I may be able to help!

slideInfo.slideDescription: Samplings of my professional and personal projects

projects.title: GV AMPP Asset Management
projects.overviewTechList: Angular 12, Typescript, Node.js, CSS/SCSS, HTML5 Supporting technologies: Jenkins, Git/Gitflow, Kubernetes
projects.description: A next-generation media asset management system soon to be available through the GV AMPP cloud-native platform within the GV Media Universe ecosystem. Some of the features will include support for content creators who need to search, edit and organize their media. More information, including additional images and documentation, can be found here.

projects.title: GV Stratus (Web Client)
projects.description: A web-based content management system that aids in video production and editing workflows. It contains a comprehensive toolset that includes video metadata management, search, hierarchical folder organization, high-resolution or proxy access to shared storage content, editing/logging, and more. A complete description and demo can be found here.

projects.title: GV Stratus (Desktop Client)
projects.description: A rich WPF desktop content management system that aids in video production and editing workflows. It contains a comprehensive toolset that includes channel injest and playout, video metadata management, search, hierarchical folder organization, high-resolution or proxy access to shared storage content, editing/logging, and more. A complete description and demo can be found here.

projects.title: Skills Project
projects.overviewTechList: Angular 12, Typescript, Node.js, Angular Material, CSS/SCSS, HTML5, Bootstrap
projects.description: A personal project that displays a resume and credential set for myself and my husband in order to demonstrate proficiency in Angular, Typescript, HTML5, and Angular Material concepts. The website can be found here.

slideInfo.slideDescription: Samplings of my professional and personal projects

timeline.quote: Time has no independent existence apart from the order of events by which we measure it. - Albert Einstein

experience.title: Staff Software Engineer
experience.duties:
Lead front-end web developer for GV AMPP Asset Management, a next generation cloud-based platform that facilitates media asset management and remote production for the video broadcast industry. Helped to design and develop the UI for managing, updating, displaying, and searching across assets and asset metadata. The UI framework was developed using TypeScript and Angular and was designed to run within a cloud-hosted microservice architecture.


Helped to design and develop the Windows-based video production and content management application, called GV STRATUS, using C# and WPF.


Participated in the design and development of a configuration and software deployment tool that customers used to commission and update their Grass Valley systems on site.
Worked on adding new features to an application that managed content for our line of video servers.

experience.title: Software Engineer (Contractor)
experience.duties: Worked on the C# Windows-based RF measurement software for the spectrum analyzer product line. Also helped to develop the automated build system using scripting.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.duties: Developed Windows-based applications that create test signals for satellite and cellular base station testing.

experience.title: Data Management
experience.duties: Worked on reviewing standardized test questions and adding them into the company’s proprietary database. Developed macros to facilitate some of this work.
